meanings.definition: To apply a substance to reduce friction
meanings.sent1: He was lubricating the gears to make them move smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic is lubricating the car engine for better performance.
meanings.sent3: The robot insisted on lubricating its joints with oil to dance better.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like lubricating oil, easing the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: Lubricating the door hinges with grease made them silent as a whisper.

meanings.sent5: The lubricating properties of the lotion made it perfect for dry skin.
